class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Email George Staib, gstaib@emory.edu for permission.
course_description: Designed for advance dance students who can demonstrate a consistent repertoire of technical skill absent of fundamental body issues. Class material challenges the student's technical and performance range and develops a sophisticated understanding of movement concepts.
sections: Class Nbr: 2461, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MWF 1-2:15p, Instructor: G. Staib, Status: Open
